mapper.select: SELECT api.id id,api.name api_name,api.category_id category_id,api.description description, request.api_id,request.name request_name,request.type request_type,request.description request_description FROM apidoc api LEFT JOIN request_parameter request ON request.api_id = api.id

SELECT api.id id,api.name api_name,api.category_id category_id,api.description description, request.api_id request_api_id ,request.name request_name,request.type request_type,request.description request_description, response.api_id response_api_id,response.name response_name,response.type response_type,response.description response_description FROM apidoc api LEFT JOIN request_parameter request ON request.api_id = api.id LEFT JOIN response_parameter response ON response.api_id = api.id WHERE api.id=#{id}

SELECT api.id id,api.name api_name,api.category_id category_id,api.description description, request.api_id request_api_id ,request.name request_name,request.type request_type,request.description request_description, response.api_id response_api_id,response.name response_name,response.type response_type,response.description response_description FROM apidoc api LEFT JOIN request_parameter request ON request.api_id = api.id LEFT JOIN response_parameter response ON response.api_id = api.id WHERE api.category_id=#{categoryId}
